author: Isobel Asher Hamilton
title: China's Wuhan couples were so eager to marry after lockdown ended that they crashed the marriage application system
description: The global epicenter of the coronavirus, the city of Wuhan in China, relaxed its 76-day lockdown on Wednesday. The day the lockdown ended, local couples flooded a local marriage-application app, causing it to crash. The app's maker said it had seen a 300% inc…
content:
Wuhan, the Chinese city at the epicenter of the coronavirus pandemic, lifted its lockdown on Wednesday and couples living there rushed to take advantage.
A local marriage application system run by Chinese tech platform Alipay saw a 300% increase in traffic, … [+1192 chars]
